inclusion.criterion: increased serum amylase or lipase after ERCP
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: new or worsening abdominal pain compatible with pancreatitis after ERCP
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: her pregnancy test is negative and she is not breastfeeding

notes: 41-year-old obese woman presenting with abdominal pain and vomiting, elevated CRP and amylase levels, and a history of frequent alcohol consumption.
